name: Air Fryer Buffalo Chicken Wings
author: Soup Loving Nicole
summary: Push the deep fryer aside and pull out the air fryer instead next game day. There is no need to add all of that oil when you can achieve crispy wings straight out of the air fryer. Serve with celery sticks and ranch dressing, if desired.
directions: Preheat an air fryer to 360 degrees F (182 degrees C)
Place wings in a large bowl
Drizzle oil over wings and massage until chicken is evenly coated
Place 1/2 the wings in the air fryer basket and cook for 25 minutes
Use tongs to flip wings and cook 5 minutes more
Transfer cooked wings to a large bowl
While second batch is cooking, combine hot pepper sauce, butter, vinegar, garlic powder, and cayenne pepper in a small saucepan over medium heat
Stir and keep warm until wings are done
Pour sauce over cooked wings and toss to coat
